Package src.main.java

Class View

java.lang.Object
src.main.java.View
public class View
extends java.lang.Object
The View classes contains all pane elements and is the UI of the application Contains all panes.
Author:
Elijah Haberman, Emily Oldham, JC Sergent, Arthur Marino, Caroline Graham
